EmailTemplate.subject: WEX Motorpass - Looking for the best fuel card for your business?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName}
We have received your request for more information through Expert Market in regards to a fuel card provider.
WEX Motorpass is Australia’s #1 most widely accepted fuel card with acceptance at over 90% of service stations across Australia.
Sign up with WEX Motorpass today and you’ll receive 5 cents off per litre for 5 months plus 2 cents off per litre on going at BP Service Stations*.
Why choose WEX Motorpass?
· No joining cancellation/termination fees · No inactive card fees or non-fuel service fees · Use Woolworths Shop-a-docket’s in conjunction with the cards · Set transaction controls to limit the amount (or volume) of fuel purchased
How does WEX Motorpass compare to other multi-branded fuel cards in the market? Click here to take a look beyond the promotional offer.
We will be calling you shortly to discuss your fuel card requirements but if you would like to find out more information right away please visit motorpass.com.au
Kind Regards,
WEX Motorpass
*The offer is available to new customers only and cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer. The offer applies to each card issued under your WEX Motorpass account, and applies only to fuel purchases. Discount does not apply to LPG fuels. Discounts are only available off the pump price at BP service stations. 5 cent discount is available for 5 months from the account opening date and will revert to 2 cents off per litre after this date. Applicants and authorised representatives must be over 18 years, have an ABN and use their vehicles for business purposes to apply. The standard WEX Motorpass terms and conditions and fees and charges apply. Please see motorpass.com.au/terms-and-conditions. Credit is issued by WEX Australia Pty Ltd ABN 68 005 970 570 and applications are subject to credit assessment criteria.
WEX Motorpass Benefits
Extensive acceptance
WEX Motorpass gives you access to one of Australia’s largest fuel networks
No more receipts
WEX Motorpass statements are approved by the Australian Tax Office
Reduced administration
Transactions are processed in real time at the terminal as opposed to some other competitors that post sales vouchers for processing
WEX Motorpass’ superior fuel card acceptance delivers savings beyond the fuel price. Visit motorpass.com.au/savings calculator to learn more
